name: tm73
effect: Teaches Thunder Wave to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Thunder Wave to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text.diamond-pearl: A weak electric charge is launched at the foe. It causes paralysis if it hits.
